text: He Said, She Said is a 1991 romantic comedy movie directed by Ken Kwapis and Marisa Silver and stars Kevin Bacon, Elizabeth Perkins, Nathan Lane, Sharon Stone, and Anthony LaPaglia. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Plot == It is the story of the relationship between journalists Dan Hanson (Kevin Bacon) and Lorie Bryer (Elizabeth Perkins) told twice â€“ once from each perspective. The male story was directed by Ken Kwapis and the female story by Marisa Silver. At the time, Kwapis and Silver were engaged, and they married soon after the film was released. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Kwapis Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: He Said, She Said
